com.apusplay.sdk.pay

接口 PayConfig

  • 所有超级接口:
    Serializable

    public interface PayConfig
extends Serializable
    The configuration information to initialize the payable instance.
    作者:
    Shyq

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      String getAppId()
      The app id is assigned by the open system.
      String getAppName()
      The app Name.
      String getPayType()
      The pay method SdkConstants.PAY_TYPE_GENERAL_GATEWAY = "PAY_GENERAL_GATEWAY"; // Generic payment gateway, PayPal, Payssion SdkConstants.PAY_TYPE_OPERATOR = "PAY_OPERATOR"; // Operator payment, such as SMS, pre-paid card, (BluePay) SdkConstants.PAY_TYPE_GOOGLE_IAB = "GOOGLE_IN-APP_BILLING"; // Google In-App Billing
      String getPublicKey()
      The value to public key
      String getSecretValue()
      The value used to make signature for given app.
      boolean isAutoConsume()
      If the purchased item would be consumed immediately
      boolean isSupportTopup()
      If the app support top up opertation.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getPayType

        String getPayType()
        The pay method SdkConstants.PAY_TYPE_GENERAL_GATEWAY = "PAY_GENERAL_GATEWAY"; // Generic payment gateway, PayPal, Payssion SdkConstants.PAY_TYPE_OPERATOR = "PAY_OPERATOR"; // Operator payment, such as SMS, pre-paid card, (BluePay) SdkConstants.PAY_TYPE_GOOGLE_IAB = "GOOGLE_IN-APP_BILLING"; // Google In-App Billing
        返回:
        pay method value in string

      • getSecretValue

        String getSecretValue()
        The value used to make signature for given app.
        返回:
        the value to add to string to make a hash value, e.g. MD5

      • getPublicKey

        String getPublicKey()
        The value to public key
        返回:
        the base64 encoded with public key

      • getAppId

        String getAppId()
        The app id is assigned by the open system.
        返回:
        the app id by assigned by open system or the package for google play hosted app.

      • getAppName

        String getAppName()
        The app Name.
        返回:
        the app name.

      • isAutoConsume

        boolean isAutoConsume()
        If the purchased item would be consumed immediately
        返回:

      • isSupportTopup

        boolean isSupportTopup()
        If the app support top up opertation.
        返回:
        if true, the onTopup() method must be implemented so that the payment result would be invoked by it if false, keep the method onTopup() dummy empty.
